snippet.title: Lincity-NG - Gameplay [4K]
snippet.description:
Lincity-NG - Gameplay [4K]

 I think it needs a lot of work some things this game does just feels like it was made for a cellphone and not for a pc but if you overlook those issues you can have a lot of fun with it.
You can download it from sourceforge 
http://sourceforge.net/projects/lincity-ng.berlios/
On ubuntu you can download it from SoftwareCenter


Here is really helpful wiki page
http://klasbricks.wikispaces.com/LinCity

One more thing you can find save games here

On Windows save files are located in
C:\Users\[USERNAME]\.lincity-ng
On ubuntu it is located in your home directory 
.lincity-ng  it is a hidden folder so make sure you enable show hidden folders 

Catch up with me on Twitter

https://twitter.com/#!/Studio76HD
My PSN Levan27
Take a look at this page
http://www.zvirti.com/
http://digitalstudio7.blogspot.com/
My Android app on google play store
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.digiclack.Colorized
